title: USB-C signal cable assemblies classified under 8544.42.9010
text: An importer MUST classify insulated USB cable assemblies with connectors under 8544.42.9010.

title: Alternative classification for USB cable assemblies
text: An importer MUST NOT classify insulated USB cable assemblies under 8544.42.9010.

title: Confirmatory ruling for low-voltage signal cables
text: Low-voltage signal cable assemblies with insulation MAY be classified under 8544.42.9010.
